page.title: 05ST. DAVID'S CHURCH
page.content: St. Davids Church is 114 years old. It was built in 1881. It has a stained glass window showing Jesus blessing his disciples. It shows Ascension day - when Jesus ascended into heaven. This window was put in at Easter 1898 by Louis Shirley in memory of his wife Jesse Theodora who died when she was only 26 years old. In the church there are the names of people living in Ely who died in the First and Second World Wars. One man from Ely, Raymond Liversuch died in the Second World Wart when his plane crashed in the sea and in the church there is a marble pot memorial to him.
